name: Bird Game
description: A short game about flying around without bumping into things.<br/><br/>You control a bird and must navigate around various obstacles.<h3>Key Features</h3><ul><li>Explore 3 well thought-out levels, each with a unique boss fight<br/></li><li>Black-and-white ink-drawing visual style<br/></li><li>Replay the game in hard mode after your first completion for a true challenge<br/></li><li>Eat fish</li></ul>
